description:
Haruka starts to work at a maid café to buy Yuuto’s Christmas present. When Yuuto finds out about it, he looks for a high paying job to buy a present for Haruka, too.
He finds a job as a live-in personal butler for Touka, the daughter of the Tennouji Family, known as the rivaling high class house to the Nogizaka Family. However, although having a similar background, Touka is completely different from Haruka. She’s a selfish, spoiled little brat, who names Yuuto, “Rodriguez,” and makes him work like crazy. However, Yuuto never gives up, and Touka starts to get drawn to him.
Source: crunchyroll
